intro: Oreograstis, commonly known as the silverleaf tree, is a member of the Euphorbiaceae family. It is characterized by its broad, waxy leaves that give it a distinctive silvery appearance. The plant is native to parts of Africa and thrives in arid and semi-arid environments. It produces small, greenish flowers that are followed by orange-colored fruits. Oreograstis is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
